level.heading: Supersedure.
level.text: This chapter shall be considered to supersede the Rental Accommodations Act of 1975, the Rental Housing Act of 1977, and the Rental Housing Act of 1980, except that a petition filed with the Rent Administrator under the Rental Housing Act of 1980 shall be determined under the provisions of the Rental Housing Act of 1980.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Rental Accommodations Act of 1975, and the Rental Housing Acts of 1977 and 1980, definitions, see § 42-3501.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-10
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-10, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3501.01.

level.heading: Termination of law Termination of Law 6-10
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3509.01.
